ElementMessage.listID: Integer <can be null, almost always needed to specify which list is being changed>
ElementMessage.elementID: Integer <can be null, only needed when access to a specific element is needed>
ElementMessage.action: String [GET_ALL, GET_ONE, GET_ALL_BY_USER, CREATE, UPDATE, DELETE, DELETE_BY_USER, DELETE_BY_LIST]

ListMessage.listID: Integer <can be null, only needed when access to a specific list is needed>
ListMessage.action: String [GET_ALL, GET_ONE, GET_ALL_BY_USER, GET_ALL_BY_LIST, CREATE, UPDATE, DELETE, DELETE_BY_USER]
